scripts.goal: Provide value, stay top of mind

scripts.template:
Hi {Name},

Hope you got a chance to check out the {resource} I sent over.

I'd love to hear your thoughts - did anything stand out to you?

Also, I'm curious: what's your timeline for {their goal}?

Happy to jump on a quick call if that's helpful.

Best,
{Your Name}

scripts.goal: Recap, provide promised materials, clarify next steps

scripts.template:
Hey {Name},

I know things get busy - just wanted to circle back.

When we last spoke, you mentioned {specific pain point}.

I've seen this become a bigger issue when left unaddressed, so I wanted to check in.

Still interested in {solution}? I have some availability this week if you want to discuss.

If timing's not right, no worries - I totally understand.

Best,
{Your Name}

scripts.goal: Professional recap, clear action items, documentation

scripts.template:
Hi {Name},

Following up on our discussion from {date}.

I wanted to share some additional context that might be relevant:

{New data point, case study, or market insight}

This reinforces the opportunity we discussed around {specific outcome}.

I have {timeframe} available if you'd like to discuss further, or I'm happy to provide additional information via email.

What works best for you?

Best regards,
{Your Name}
scripts.goal: Add value, demonstrate expertise, advance conversation

scripts.template:
Hi {Name},

I've reached out a few times about {topic}, but haven't heard back.

I understand priorities shift, and this might not be the right fit or timing.

Before I close your file, I wanted to check one last time:

Is this something you'd like to explore, or should I follow up at a later date?

Either way, I appreciate your time.

If you ever need {what you offer}, you know where to find me!

Best,
{Your Name}
scripts.goal: Final attempt, leave door open, maintain relationship
